item.title: Tell HN: Nearly all of Evernote's remaining staff has been laid off
item.description: - Evernote, a popular note-taking app, has laid off a significant portion of its staff.

item.title: GPT-4 API General Availability
item.description: - OpenAI has announced the general availability of the GPT-4 API, their most capable model, to all paying API customers.

item.title: Godot 4.1
item.description: - Godot 4.1 is a new update that brings smoother performance, improved AI navigation avoidance, and the ability to detach code editors.

item.title: Air France denied my delay compensation, so I challenged them & won
item.description: - Airlines operating in Europe are required by law to get passengers to their final destination within a specific timeframe, and passengers are entitled to compensation if this is not met.

item.title: France passes bill to allow police remotely activate phone camera, microphone
item.description: - A bill has been passed in France that allows the police to remotely activate the cameras, microphones, and GPS of suspects' phones in order to spy on them.

item.title: Cloud Backed SQLite
item.description: - The "Cloud Backed SQLite" (CBS) system allows databases to be stored within cloud storage accounts, allowing them to be read and written by storage clients without downloading the entire database.

item.title: Backend of Meta Threads is built with Python 3.10
item.description: - Twitter's new pricing structure has led to a restriction on the option to unroll tweets on the web, which is now only available for Premium members.

item.title: LEGO Building Instructions
item.description: - This post contains a dump of all available building instruction booklet PDFs from the LEGO website as of March 2023.

item.title: Injunction issued in case about social media pressure from US Government
item.description: - A federal judge has issued a preliminary injunction ordering the Biden administration to stop communicating with social media companies in a lawsuit filed by Missouri and Louisiana.

item.title: {n} times faster than C
item.description: - The post explores the process of optimizing a C code loop by making tweaks and measuring the resulting speedup.
